page.title: 04Local History-Town Hall
page.content:
{The Old Town Hall}
The Old Town Hall is now the hall of{St.John's Ambulance Brigade}.It seems incredible as it has served as a Town Hall,courthouse and jail for over 300 years.Its appearance has been changed in that the staircase entrance door and the spire have been altered. Underneath was the jail.The entrance goes to the town hall and an outer staircase led to a small court room. At one end was a chair for the Baliff(he was the magistrate).Benches on either side were for the Jurats. Town Records,reports and many trials were held here.An example of a crime was John Gordon who was sent to the notorious{Botany Bay}for 7 years. Alterations were once carried out:a Tudor stone gateway was removed from here.
